title: How the Trump-Putin bromance flowered − then soured
shortDescription: Trump said he would end the war in Ukraine within his first 24 hours in office. His patience with Russia's Putin now appears to be wearing thin.

title: Trump urges immigration agents to arrest 'THUGS' in violent clashes
shortDescription: Trump urged immigration agents to use 'whatever means is necessary' to arrest 'THUGS' who attack them, after violent clash in California.

title: Big Tech will survive Trump tariffs, CEO of $4 trillion NVIDIA says
shortDescription: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang spoke to USA TODAY about tariffs, trade and his trip to China after a meeting with President Donald Trump at the White House.

title: Trump praises ‘unity’ in Texas flood response
shortDescription: President Donald Trump participated in a roundtable with first responders following devastating Texas floods.

title: Texas man charged with threatening Trump day before flood-damage tour
shortDescription: A Texas man was charged July 10 with threatening Trump the day before the president toured flood-damaged areas of the state.

title: Trump nominates 'alpha male' Nick Adams as U.S. ambassador to Malaysia
shortDescription: President Donald Trump nominated Nick Adams, an Australian-born conservative commentator, to be the next U.S. ambassador to Malaysia.

title: Trump surveys damage in flood-hit Kerr County
shortDescription: President Donald Trump visited Kerr County, Texas, after deadly floods on July 4. More than 120 people have died and over 160 remain missing.

title: 'This is a tough one' Trump says in visit to flood-ravaged Texas
shortDescription: "It’s hard to believe the devastation," Trump said. "Trees that are 100 years old just ripped out of the ground. I've never seen anything like this, and I've seen a lot of bad ones."

title: David Gergen, former White House advisor, dies at 83
shortDescription: David Gergen, a White House advisor to former Presidents Richard Nixon, Gerald Ford, Ronald Reagan and Bill Clinton, died on July 10 at 83.

title: Senate wants to up Ukraine funding amid Pentagon pause in aid
shortDescription: The Senate wants to increase funding for Ukraine's military by $200 million after Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth paused Ukraine aid.

title: White House shares 'Superman Trump' poster with president as superhero
shortDescription: The White House shared an altered movie poster for "Superman" on Thursday, and it replaces David Corenswet's face with President Donald Trump's.

title: Trump teases 'major statement' on Russia amid new attacks on Ukraine
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he plans to make a "major statement" on Russia on Monday amid Vladimir Putin's continued attacks on Ukraine.

title: Alleged Trump assassin Ryan Routh seeks to represent himself in court
shortDescription: The man accused of trying to assassinate Donald Trump wants to represent himself at trial, which prosecutors say he wants to turn "into a circus."

title: Trump at odds with MAGA movement on multiple fronts | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Texas flood victims are being remembered by their communities. | The Secret Service has suspended six staff members amid Trump assassination attempt.

title: Why Ken Paxton's divorce could be a problem in Texas Senate race
shortDescription: The controversial attorney general has been polling well in the Texas primary race.

title: What to know about Ken Paxton, Texas AG and GOP Senate candidate
shortDescription: Ken Paxton blamed "political attacks” for divorce filing. Here's what to know about the Texas politician who has faced controversies over the years.

title: Trump administration sues state over inflated egg prices
shortDescription: The Trump administration filed a lawsuit against California alleging its regulations on egg production led to a sharp increase in prices nationally.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump heads to Texas
shortDescription: The visit comes a week after deadly floods and more news to start your Friday.

title: Hard scramble: Trump administration sues California over egg prices
shortDescription: The Trump administration accuses California of passing laws that have of contributed to rising egg prices across the country.
